this_title: Gold: The Story of Man's 6000 year obsession
introduction: From mining and exploration, to an exclusive look deep inside a top-security Swiss bank-vault, this is the epic, untold story of gold’s 6000 year history. With help from leading industry insiders, Grant Williams uncovers how gold became central to the modern global finance system.Grant Williams presents the definitive analysis of gold, in a brand new two-part Real Vision documentary, to understand why gold became money and has outlasted every alternative currency for thousands of years. Featuring an incredible collection of experts and market analysts, Episode One charts the history of the yellow metal, and shows us why gold has retained its unique place at the center of the global financial system.—Real Vision
chinese_title: Gold: The Story of Man's 6000 year obsession
